snippet: Last summer’s drought, one of the worst in a century, has continued through the winter. This chart shows the proportion of what is now the contiguous U.S. in various stages of drought over 118 years of record-keeping. Roll mouse over individual...
lead_paragraph: Last summer’s drought, one of the worst in a century, has continued through the winter. This chart shows the proportion of what is now the contiguous U.S. in various stages of drought over 118 years of record-keeping. Roll mouse over individual months to see what percentage of the lower 48 was in drought.

headline.main: Drought and Deluge in the Lower 48
